Soul Stab.name: Soul Stab
Soul Stab.flavor: A twist of your blade is a twist in your enemyâ€™s soul, wrenching it sideways to strike its companion.
Soul Stab.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares. The target then makes a basic attack against a creature of your choice.

Crown of Souls.name: Crown of Souls
Crown of Souls.flavor: The radiant crown settling on your brow symbolizes your mastery. Shadows of the crown flash above your companions.
Crown of Souls.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever you make multiple attack rolls at one time against your oath of enmity target and they would all hit, choose an ally within 5 squares of you. That ally gains a +1 power bonus to attack rolls and all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Imperator's Judgment.name: Imperator's Judgment
Imperator's Judgment.flavor: You deliver a punishing blow to your foe while pronouncing judgment against it. For a moment, your divine authority compels it to obey you.
Imperator's Judgment.onHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is dominated until the end of your next turn.
Imperator's Judgment.effect: You gain another use of your soul stab power for this encounter.
